## PinComponent type

A functional component that can be used to render a custom marker on the map.

**Signature:**

```typescript
type PinComponent<T> = (props: PinComponentProps<T>) => JSX.Element;
```
**References:** [PinComponentProps](./search-ui-react.pincomponentprops.md)
